value:
That Rickard... Kid's got potential.
If only he'd put in a bit more effort.
Nah, I guess that's just the way he is.

There's been rumors about a ghastly
priest wandering around near my
village. Hope it's not a bad omen...

Leave the scouting to me! While you
take a breather, I bet I can even find
out the location of the secret shop.

I-it's not like that with Lena and me.
I just... I'll put it this way: I'd go to the
ends of the earth to protect her.

A little turn of the lock like that and...
it's open! Even though I quit thieving
for Lena's sake, I can't get rusty.

Hi, I'm Julian. I'm one of the good
guys, don't worry. Take this from
your buddy $Nf.

No matter what, I'll protect Lena.
That's the purpose of my strength!

Not bad, eh? Think I'm getting
the hang of using weapons.
Damn, if I don't do better...

Fighting isn't really my expertise,
but this should help me do my part.

Hey, I'm Julian. You troubled?
I might have some advice if you
wanna confide in me.

Hey there. We did good work today,
don't you think? Even if the world's
in a tough place right now.$k$pGee, the Heroes really are something.
Some can take out a foe in one hit!
If only I had that kind of strength...$k$pWhat, did you think I was going to
say I'd steal a secret technique? No
way! I've had a change of heart.$k$pNow, I'm just a guy who works at a
monastery helpin' kids who lost their
parents during the war.$k$pIn order to protect the ones you love,
you gotta fight. So that's why I'm at
your service, $Nu.
てやっ
Eat this!
ぐうっ
Ow!
How 'bout this!
I won't go easy on you.
For Lena!
It's about justice!
Sorry... Lena...
Chuckle...
Julian, at your service. Used to be bad, but I got better.
Hey, relax. I've washed my hands of thievery.
You can thank Lena for knocking some sense into me.
I don't think Rickard'll ever straighten himself out.
If there are two people I trust, they're Kris and Prince Marth.
I'll be strong for Lena, no matter what. Even if we can't be together.
Helping people's how I make up for the things I've done. So let me help you.
Whatever you say.
You sure about this?
I'll handle it.
